Title: Relates to general hospital and safety net hospital reimbursement and Medicaid adjustments
Summary: Relates to general hospital and safety net hospital reimbursement rates and Medicaid adjustments.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public health law, in relation to the general hospital indigent care pool, hospital reimbursements and adjustments to medical assistance rates to enhanced safety net hospitals; and to amend chapter 474 of the laws of 1996 amending the education law and other laws relating to rates for residential health care facilities, in relation to extending the effectiveness of such rates
